DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether low dose flu vaccine deliver microneedles skin ( intradermally ) effective .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Evaluate Safety Immunogenicity Low Dose Flu Vaccines
DOC.detailed_description: Influenza vaccination primary method prevent influenza severe complication . Previous clinical study demonstrate delivery vaccine intradermally ( skin ) achieve good efficacy even low dos vaccine . Comparison : Low dose flu vaccine deliver intradermally microneedle device compare standard dose flu vaccine deliver intramuscularly ( muscle ) regular needle .
DOC.criteria: Signed Informed Consent No previous immunerelated disease Important Significant illness within previous 4 week Subjects receive influenza vaccine within previous 6 month An active viral disease Pregnant nursing woman Any known contraindication study vaccine vaccine ingredient
